subject: ADC Funds Portfolio.
body:
From the desk of: Mr. Lynn Pate
Account Officer (Debt. Reconciliation)
Credit Suisse Financial LLC
#11 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10010, USA
Tel: 1-801-635-8269

Dear Edward ,

On behalf of the entire Managment of the UBS, this is to inform you that the UBS have received your Application of claim from your Associate and Partner Kenneth Ridings for Transfer of Amedeo Development Corporation Investment Funds Portfolio valued US$250,000,000.00 to you as the current Asset Manager and Trustee of the Portfolio.

Sincerely,
Lynn Pate.
Find attached a copy of my ID.
::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
The content of this email is confidential and intended for the recipient specified in message only. It is strictly forbidden to share any part of this message with any third party, without a written consent of the sender. If you received this message by mistake, please reply to this message and follow with its deletion, so that we can ensure such a mistake does not occur in the future
